properties.entry: SELECT CAL_TR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(START_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY-MM-DD')START_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(END_DATE,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY-MM-DD')END_DATE , CAL_TITLE , CAL_CONTENT , CAL_COLOR FROM MZYM_CALENDAR WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MZYM_CALENDER VALUES ( SEQ_SEQ_CALNO.NEXTVAL , (SELECT USER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND PHONE = ?) , ? -- CAL_TR , ? -- START_DATE , ? -- END_DATE , ? -- CAL_TITLE , ? -- CAL_CONTENT , ? -- CAL_COLOR , 'Y' )
